issue.title: Don't auto-rotate doors when not hovered over a (vertical) wall segment

content.raw: Hmm I see the problem. What if we just don't let users release a door anywhere but on a wall? How hard would this be?: User hovers over 2D View with door --> clicks outside of wall --> door does not release and a tooltip attaches to the cursor saying "Doors can only be placed on a wall" --> Tooltip disappears once the user hovers over a wall
